import { LinkButton } from "@astrojs/starlight/components";

## In your terminal, verify that you are currently in the root directory of your project

```bash
pwd
```

![pwd output](data:image/png;base64,)

Now, let's run our program:

```bash
node app.js
```

![node appjs output](data:image/png;base64,)
